Gawker \- Making Facebook Pay
snippet.description: But there could well be a multi-million-dollar price to pay for the aggressive change, particularly if Facebook broke the law. It had to revert to its old privacy policy, and pay a fine. Facebook is already on the hook for $9.5 million it agreed to pay to settle a class-action suit over its Beacon advertising system.
